org.apache.hadoop.ipc

Class Server.Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.ipc.Server.Connection
  • Enclosing class:
    Server

    public class Server.Connection
extends Object
    Reads calls from a connection and queues them for handling.

      • setupBadVersionResponse

        private void setupBadVersionResponse(int clientVersion)
                              throws IOException
        Try to set up the response to indicate that the client version is incompatible with the server. This can contain special-case code to speak enough of past IPC protocols to pass back an exception to the caller.
        Parameters:
        clientVersion - the version the caller is using
        Throws:
        IOException

      • processConnectionContext

        private void processConnectionContext(DataInputStream dis)
                               throws Server.WrappedRpcServerException
        Reads the connection context following the connection header
        Parameters:
        dis - - DataInputStream from which to read the header
        Throws:
        Server.WrappedRpcServerException - - if the header cannot be deserialized, or the user is not authorized

      • unwrapPacketAndProcessRpcs

        private void unwrapPacketAndProcessRpcs(byte[] inBuf)
                                 throws Server.WrappedRpcServerException,
                                        IOException,
                                        InterruptedException
        Process a wrapped RPC Request - unwrap the SASL packet and process each embedded RPC request
        Parameters:
        buf - - SASL wrapped request of one or more RPCs
        Throws:
        IOException - - SASL packet cannot be unwrapped
        InterruptedException
        Server.WrappedRpcServerException

      • processOneRpc

        private void processOneRpc(byte[] buf)
                    throws IOException,
                           Server.WrappedRpcServerException,
                           InterruptedException
        Process an RPC Request - handle connection setup and decoding of request into a Call
        Parameters:
        buf - - contains the RPC request header and the rpc request
        Throws:
        IOException - - internal error that should not be returned to client, typically failure to respond to client
        Server.WrappedRpcServerException - - an exception to be sent back to the client that does not require verbose logging by the Listener thread
        InterruptedException

      • checkRpcHeaders

        private void checkRpcHeaders(org.apache.hadoop.ipc.protobuf.RpcHeaderProtos.RpcRequestHeaderProto header)
                      throws Server.WrappedRpcServerException
        Verify RPC header is valid
        Parameters:
        header - - RPC request header
        Throws:
        Server.WrappedRpcServerException - - header contains invalid values

      • processRpcRequest

        private void processRpcRequest(org.apache.hadoop.ipc.protobuf.RpcHeaderProtos.RpcRequestHeaderProto header,
                     DataInputStream dis)
                        throws Server.WrappedRpcServerException,
                               InterruptedException
        Process an RPC Request - the connection headers and context must have been already read
        Parameters:
        header - - RPC request header
        dis - - stream to request payload
        Throws:
        Server.WrappedRpcServerException - - due to fatal rpc layer issues such as invalid header or deserialization error. In this case a RPC fatal status response will later be sent back to client.
        InterruptedException

      • processRpcOutOfBandRequest

        private void processRpcOutOfBandRequest(org.apache.hadoop.ipc.protobuf.RpcHeaderProtos.RpcRequestHeaderProto header,
                              DataInputStream dis)
                                 throws Server.WrappedRpcServerException,
                                        IOException,
                                        InterruptedException
        Establish RPC connection setup by negotiating SASL if required, then reading and authorizing the connection header
        Parameters:
        header - - RPC header
        dis - - stream to request payload
        Throws:
        Server.WrappedRpcServerException - - setup failed due to SASL negotiation failure, premature or invalid connection context, or other state errors
        IOException - - failed to send a response back to the client
        InterruptedException

        private void authorizeConnection()
                          throws Server.WrappedRpcServerException
        Authorize proxy users to access this server
        Throws:
        Server.WrappedRpcServerException - - user is not allowed to proxy
